      Executes the given command and stores the results into a DDF which already has a schema to govern the data loading, from the system default data source, using its default Schema.DataFormat.

      Executes the given command and stores the results into a DDF, using the specified Schema.DataFormat, from the system default data source.

    • Uses of DDF in io.ddf.ml

      Methods in io.ddf.ml that return DDF 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DDF MLSupporter.applyModel(IModel model)
      Base implementation does nothing
      DDF ISupportML.applyModel(IModel model)
      The DDF is assumed not to have a label column, and the output should not include the feature columns.
      DDF MLSupporter.applyModel(IModel model, boolean hasLabels) 
      DDF ISupportML.applyModel(IModel model, boolean hasLabels)
      The output by default will not include the feature columns.
      DDF MLSupporter.applyModel(IModel model, boolean hasLabels, boolean includeFeatures)
